value.title: Former Vice President Mike Pence to publish memoir
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence is set to chronical his experience in the Trump White House with a two-book deal he signed with Simon & Schuster Wednesday. The publisher said Pence will pen ...

value.title: Biden's planned pick for ATF director a fierce advocate for gun control
value.excerpt: David Chipman, President Joe Biden's planned nominee for director of the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives, has a long history at the agency and sports credentials in gun control advocacy sure to excite firearm safety groups.

value.title: Trump’s ex-campaign manager Brad Parscale helping Caitlyn Jenner explore run for California governor
value.excerpt: Former Trump campaign manager Brad Parscale is helping Caitlyn Jenner as she very seriously explores running for Governor in California, Fox News has learned.

value.title: Boehner lays blame for 'that bloody insurrection' at Trump's feet
value.excerpt: Former House Speaker John Boehner said former President Donald Trump "incited that bloody insurrection" at the US Capitol and blamed his false election claims for the GOP losing control of Congress, according to excerpts from his forthcoming book obtained by The New York Times.

value.title: Trump endorses Alabama’s Mo Brooks for Senate, a promoter of his false claims of a stolen election
value.excerpt: Trump’s early endorsement is a major boost to Brooks, who has operated on the rightmost edge of the Republican Party during his time in the House.

value.title: Biden chief of staff once said roads and bridges are what 'most Americans think' infrastructure is
value.excerpt: As Democrats continue to expand their definition of infrastructure, White House chief of staff Ron Klain reined in what qualified as infrastructure in 2017 under the Trump administration.

value.title: Parents of 445 migrant children separated at border under Trump still have not been found, court filing says
value.excerpt: The parents of 445 migrant children separated from their families due to Trump administration policies at the US-Mexico border between 2017 and 2018 have still not been located, down from 506, according to a Wednesday court filing.

value.title: Rep. McCaul says Biden's immigration policies a 'victory' for traffickers and 'very bad defeat' for children
value.excerpt: Rep. Michael McCaul, R-Texas, slammed President Biden's border policies Wednesday on "The Story," calling them a "victory" for traffickers, who separate children from their parents and bring them on a "very dangerous journey" to the United States.

value.title: Mike Pence's Advocacy Group to Hone in Unaccompanied Minor Surge at Border

value.title: Mike Pence to publish book, covering political career from Indiana to the White House
value.excerpt: Wednesday was a busy day for former vice president Mike Pence. Pence is publishing his first autobiography with publisher Simon & Schuster, the company announced in a news release. The book announcement comes the same day Pence announced he is launching ...

value.title: Mother of all book deals: Mike Pence signs seven-figure deal for memoirs
value.excerpt: Mike Pence has signed a two-book deal for his memoir that is reported to be worth millions of dollars, making him one of the first of former president Donald Trump’s inner circle to announce such a lucrative arrangement. Pence’s autobiography ...

value.title: Pence launches group as Trump officials line up new roles

value.title: McConnell again slams Biden as a leftist: 'Bernie Sanders is really happy'
value.excerpt: Sen. Mitch McConnell doubled down on calling President Biden “far-left,” after the administration shot back, saying Wednesday there is “nothing at all moderate about the administration so far.”

value.title: Omar says it's 'shameful and unacceptable' for Biden to 'continue the construction' of Trump border wall
value.excerpt: Rep. Ilhan Omar, D-Minn., put heat on the Biden administration Wednesday not to restart funding for the border wall.

value.title: Biden expected to announce executive actions on gun control Thursday
value.excerpt: President Biden will announce new executive action on gun control on Thursday, White House press secretary Jen Psaki indicated Wednesday.

value.title: Nasty notes left for Trump staffers came from celebs, not Obama aides, Dave Chappelle says

value.title: Biden rhetoric on anti-Asian racism undercut by his DOJ dropping Yale lawsuit, advocates say
value.excerpt: President Biden has spoken out forcefully against anti-Asian racism, but the sincerity of his words is called into question by his administration's decision to drop a lawsuit against Yale University for allegedly discriminating against Asian applicants, advocates tell Fox News.

value.title: Andrew Giuliani, former Trump aide and son of Rudy Giuliani, says he plans for to run for governor of New York
value.excerpt: Andrew Giuliani, the son of former New York Mayor Rudy Giuliani, says he's planning to run for governor of the heavily Democratic state next year.

value.title: Trump endorses Republican ally Mo Brooks for Alabama Senate
value.excerpt: Former President Donald Trump on Wednesday endorsed Rep. Mo Brooks' campaign for US Senate in Alabama, supporting the controversial GOP congressman who stood by him during two impeachments and led the House effort to object to the 2020 election results.

value.title: Pence launches new advocacy organization to promote 'pro-freedom policies of the last four years'
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence on Wednesday launched a new policy and advocacy organization to promote "pro-freedom policies of the last four years," featuring an advisory board of nearly a dozen Trump-era alumni.

value.title: Donald Trump Defends Matt Gaetz, Denies Florida Congressman Asked for Pardon
value.excerpt: Former President Donald Trump has released a brief statement denying that GOP Representative Matt Gaetz of Florida solicited a pardon from him, while also offering a defense of the embattled congressman. "Congressman Matt Gaetz has never asked me for a pardon.

value.title: Exclusive: EPA reverses Trump stance in push to tackle environmental racism
value.excerpt: Enforcement of pollution violations dropped steeply under Donald Trump’s administration, with the EPA even suspending routine inspections of facilities while the Covid-19 pandemic raged in the US last year. A lack of federal intervention further ...

value.title: Pence launches political advocacy group with an eye to the Trump legacy -- and his own future
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence on Wednesday announced the launch of a new political advocacy group, "Advancing American Freedom," a move designed with an eye to his political future and his efforts to help shape the conversation around the Trump administration's legacy.
